author: francis.li
content:
Hey y'all, connecting with <@520034910149410861> previous message, would love your reviews and feedback on 
1. https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9378 (move cell proof computation to tx sender)
2. and https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/630 the related execution-api related changes

Currently the PR tries to go with just replacing the network wrapper format without creating a new tx type üôè

Ideally we could go over this soon and make a final decision on next week's ACDE call
